>Finally, thanks Ian for joining in, and Collin for your continued
>contribution!

No problem, unfortunately this machine is not left on at night or the weekend.

Incidentally, our Internet connection is flaky here, and most of the time 
your script handles it.  However, occasionally it seems that if the 
Internet goes off while wget is running, then wget hangs forever.

This may be a windows thing, windows generally seems more subject to 
applications hanging forever when the Internet goes off and on.  Maybe you 
could have  second process monitoring wget and executing a kill if it runs 
for more than 2 mins?

         Ian Badcoe
